channel.title: Triticum turgidum on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Triticum turgidum on funPlantGenes

item.title: Lpx-B1.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Lpx-B1.1 Gene Name: lipoxygenase1 Genome: Species: Triticum turgidum Functional Descriptions: Insight into durum wheat Lpx-B1: a small gene family coding for the lipoxygenase responsible for carotenoid bleaching in mature grains.
